adDetails: I have been in the plumbing industry for many years and have seen the industry go completely out of control. The quality of workmanship is down and there are only a few in my opinion that still take pride in the quality of workmanship that is shown to the customers. I have looked at many jobs and have seen the quality of work and the lack of understanding the Uniform Plumbing Code. I am a Master Plumber by trade and I am willing to offer my services at a discounted rate, since most of us out there are having problems due to the state of the economy. I have a low over head so I can do most jobs at a fraction of what you would pay a large shop. To schedule your free in home estimate or a free consultation over the phone please contact Jesse at 831 1. TOILET REPAIR 2. FLUSH VALVES 3. FILL VALVE 4. EMERGENCY SHUT OFF'S 5.
